description: Healing and Restoration Through Torah, Only through the Torah do we find the true power of transformation of our souls.  This is the definition of healing--transformation of our souls.  It is from the soul that it translates into the physical.
title: Healing and Restoration Through Torah

episodes.title: The Healing Power of Torah Class 02
episodes.description: Miriam Ben-Yaacov teaches us about the healing power of Torah for our mind, soul and body. We hope you will consider joining others in donating to Noahide Nations and become part of maintaining the Noahide Nations Torah Network. With your support we can continue to bring you these and other Torah teachings. Visit us at www.noahidenations.com

episodes.title: The Healing Power of Torah Class 07
episodes.description: Miriam Ben-Yaacov leads us on a journey into the Garden, where one may partake of the Tree of Life—Using the weekly Parsha reading Miriam teaches the four levels of Torah; Pashat, Remez, Derush and Sod, all necessary for full understanding, represented by the acronym PaRDes, which means “garden” or “orchard” in Hebrew. We hope you will consider joining others in donating to Noahide Nations and become part of maintaining the Noahide Nations Torah Network. With your support we can continue to bring you these and other Torah teachings. Visit us at www.noahidenations.com
